text: Hianagi Joapu'a amanage huno ana kenona hu'ne, Ra Anumzamo'a vahe'a mago'ane 100'a zupa zamazeri rama'a hanigeno, rama'a vahe fore hu'za manigahazanki, rania kini ne'moka nagafare ama zana hu'za nehaze? Zamagra kagri eri'za vahe mani'nazanki, nahigenka Israeli vahera zamavarenka kumipina zamante'za nehane?
